mapper.select: SELECT commentcount, board_no, board_title, board_date, board_like, user_no, user_name FROM viewboard LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT (SELECT count(*) from comment c WHERE b.board_no=c.board_no) as commentcount, b.*, u.user_id, u.user_name FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_no=u.user_no WHERE b.board_no=#{board_no}
